locations.description: Locations to discover Arc resources from.

scopeType.description: The type of scope, currently supporting SubscriptionOrResourceGroupIds only.

subscriptionOrResourceGroupIds.description: List of subscription or resource group ARM IDs. Allowed only if scopeType is SubscriptionOrResourceGroupIds.

syncType.description: The type of sync, currently supporting Manual and Periodic.

tagSyncMode.description: Tag Sync Confirmation. If Enabled, tags on Arc resources will be synced to Azure Migrate resources.

discoverySiteId.description: Gets or sets the discovery site Id.

fqdn.description: Gets or sets the FQDN/IPAddress of the Hyper-V cluster.

hostFqdnList.description: Gets or sets list of hosts (FQDN) currently being tracked by the cluster.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

runAsAccountId.description: Gets or sets Run as account ID of the Hyper-V cluster.

fqdn.description: Gets or sets the FQDN/IPAddress of the Hyper-V host.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

runAsAccountId.description: Gets or sets the run as account ID of the Hyper-V host.

discoverySolutionId.description: Gets or sets the ARM ID of migration hub solution for SDS.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

allowMultipleSites.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether multiple sites per site type are
allowed.

customerStorageAccountArmId.description: Gets or sets a value for customer storage account ARM id.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Gets or sets the state of public network access.

sites.description:
Gets or sets the sites that are a part of Master Site.
            The key
should contain the Site ARM name.

agentDetails.description: Gets or sets the on-premises agent details.

applianceName.description: Gets or sets the Appliance Name.

arcScope.description: Gets or sets the Arc scope properties for the server site.

discoveryScenario.description: Gets or sets the discovery scenario.

discoverySolutionId.description: Gets or sets the ARM ID of migration hub solution for SDS.

servicePrincipalIdentityDetails.description: Gets or sets the service principal identity details used by agent for communication to the service.

siteAppliancePropertiesCollection.description: Gets or sets the appliance details used by service to communicate to the appliance.

keyVaultId.description: Gets or sets the key vault ARM Id.

keyVaultUri.description: Gets or sets the key vault URI.

agentDetails.description: Gets or sets the on-premises agent details.

applianceName.description: Gets or sets the Appliance Name.

servicePrincipalIdentityDetails.description: Gets or sets the service principal identity details used by agent for  communication              to the service.

applianceName.description: Gets or sets the Appliance Name.

discoveryScenario.description: Gets or sets the discovery scenario.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

Gets or sets the service principal identity details used by agent for
communication
            to the service.

siteAppliancePropertiesCollection.description: Gets or sets the appliance details used by service to communicate to the appliance.

aadAuthority.description:
Gets or sets the AAD Authority URL which was used to request the token for
the
            service principal.

applicationId.description:
Gets or sets the application/client Id for the service principal with which
the
            on-premise management/data plane components would communicate
with our Azure 
            services.

audience.description: Gets or sets the intended audience for the service principal.

machineResourceId.description: Gets or sets the ARM ID of the arc for servers resource.

objectId.description:
Gets or sets the object Id of the service principal with which the on-premise

           management/data plane components would communicate with our Azure
services.

rawCertData.description: Gets or sets the raw certificate data for building certificate expiry flows.

tenantId.description:
Gets or sets the tenant Id for the service principal with which the
on-premise
            management/data plane components would communicate with
our Azure services.

agentDetails.description: Gets or sets the on-premises agent details.

applianceName.description: Gets or sets the Appliance Name.

discoveryScenario.description: Gets or sets the discovery scenario.

discoverySolutionId.description: Gets or sets the ARM ID of migration hub solution for SDS.

servicePrincipalIdentityDetails.description:
Gets or sets the service principal identity details used by agent for
communication
            to the service.

siteAppliancePropertiesCollection.description: Gets or sets the appliance details used by service to communicate to the appliance.

discoverySiteId.description: Gets or sets the discovery site Id.

arcScope.description: Gets or sets the Arc scope properties for the sql site.

discoveryScenario.description: Gets or sets the discovery scenario.

siteAppliancePropertiesCollection.description:
Gets or sets the appliance details used by service to communicate
           
to the appliance.

fqdn.description: Gets or sets the FQDN/IPAddress of the vCenter.

friendlyName.description: Gets or sets the friendly name of the vCenter.

port.description: Gets or sets the port of the vCenter.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

runAsAccountId.description: Gets or sets the run as account ID of the vCenter.

discoveryScenario.description: Gets or sets the discovery scenario.

siteAppliancePropertiesCollection.description:
Gets or sets the appliance details used by service to communicate
           
to the appliance.
